entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a teacher who has been assigned to Harry with a task. He is described as cold and quiet throughout the passage.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who has been given a task by Snape. He is described as having a rumbling stomach and hurrying out of the door.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is one of the four houses at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. It is mentioned as possibly having won or lost a game.

relationships.description: Snape has assigned Harry with a task, which he needs to complete by next Saturday.
Harry is a member of Gryffindor house.
